snippet.title: [Frostpunk: Beyond the Ice] Ingame Preview
snippet.description:
❄Official Mobile Version of Best-selling Frostpunk IP❄
❄A society survival city-builder and management game set in a post apocalyptic ice age❄

COMING SOON to early access on mobile in the United States, the United Kingdom, and the Philippines! 

Pre-registration for the early access is now open.   
For more info, visit: https://www.frostpunkbeyondtheice.com

Stay Connected
❄Twitter: https://twitter.com/FrostpunkM
❄Hive Forum: https://community.withhive.com/Frostpunk/en/

#Frostpunk #frostpunkbeyondtheice #mobilegame
